Any ways I fixed it

As an amateur sea dog, I disagree with the notion that Sona would make a good pirate. Good pirates need to talk/swear/drunkenly mumble like a pirate. Being mute, she cannot do that. What kind of pirate can't tell a filthy bilgerat to crawl back into yer bunghole?

she can do this

http://t12.deviantart.net/4FYZdntjhAzehMx3LpAMQ9x0Qhs=/fit-in/150x150/filters:no_upscale():origin()/pre13/f65d/th/pre/f/2013/287/4/3/lol___no_words__uncensored__by_cubehero-d6qi36b.jpg

Unless PSL (Pirate sign language) is ever developed and widely used, I don't think that hand gestures would ever make up for the inability to speak

Sorry to crush your dreams like this :((((((((((((((
but its perfect, its a secret code only her crew would know
But what good is being a pirate if your enemies don't know that you talk like an idiot?
i mean you have to have one rational sober person who stops someone from throwing themselves off the deck
No you don't! IT ISN'T A PIRATE SHIP UNLESS EVERYONE IS DRUNK!
I disagree, gangplank doesnt get drunk.... current one.

He actually ferments all of his oranges under the deck of his ship. He's actually always drunk, and has been for the past 17 years. His senses have adapted by this point, so nobody can really tell that he's all that drunk. His senses have gotten so used to this drunkeness, that if he were to NOT drink any alcohol, he would be in a state of intoxication until he consumed more. Like how Bender gets when he doesn't drink anything

i guess she'd be great as the ship's Sonarrrr!

^^;

I tip my hat to you sir.
